sentences.english: Shocking footage from China has captured the moment the outer wall of a high-rise building 'peels' off and crashes to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 令人震驚的視頻顯示中國高層建築的外層剝落的情景。

sentences.english: We still remember last year, when the first scene scarf to wear it?
sentences.chinese: 還記得我們上一年級時，第一次戴上領巾時的情景嗎？

sentences.english: Unforgettable scenes flashed across his mind.
sentences.chinese: 一幕難忘的情景，立即在他腦海映現。

sentences.english: Only my work helped me forget what I was seeing. "——H. S."
sentences.chinese: 只有我的工作讓我忘記所見到的情景。

sentences.english: The happy scene of children playing in the garden reminded him of his childhood.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們在花園中游玩的歡樂情景使他想起了他的童年。

sentences.english: I recall Duan Jin's first visit to Australia.
sentences.chinese: 我回想起段津首次來澳大利亞訪問的情景。

sentences.english: The sitcom single woman is never alone for long.
sentences.chinese: 情景喜劇中的單身女人從來不會獨身很久的。

sentences.english: The reverse is experiencing rebirth or healing.
sentences.chinese: 相反的情景是重生或傷病痊癒。

sentences.english: I shall never forget seeing Lu Xun for the first time in 1932.
sentences.chinese: 我永遠不會忘記一九三二年第一次見到魯迅的情景。

sentences.english: I wonder if Sasha will remember that moment when she is grown.
sentences.chinese: 我想知道，當莎夏長大後，她是否會記得當時的情景。

sentences.english: Both of them can form single-word questions and express interrogation.
sentences.chinese: 在對話情景下都可單獨成句，表達疑問。

sentences.english: The sight that met my eyes made it hard to keep a straight face.
sentences.chinese: 映入眼簾的情景使我難以板起面孔。

sentences.english: The shambles in Guazhou does not give one cause for optimism.
sentences.chinese: 瓜州風電建設的混亂情景不容樂觀。

sentences.english: The situation comedy is going to start soon, just switch to channel one.
sentences.chinese: 情景喜劇馬上就要開播了，快調到一頻道。

sentences.english: Terrorist scenarios previously considered far-fetched suddenly became operative presumptions.
sentences.chinese: 恐怖情景以前認爲牽強成了部分假設。

sentences.english: She says she likes it when she sees a mother deer playing with her fawns.
sentences.chinese: 說她喜歡看着母鹿與小鹿嬉戲的情景。

definition: scene/tableau/picture/image/screen (displayed by a computer)/(motion picture) frame/field of view
to recall/to think of/to call to mind
to witness/to see at first hand/to see with one's own eyes
to see for oneself/to see with one's own eyes
